CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 31, 1959, pg. 19, reads: "Chat Time - Film producer-actor-singer Harry Belafonte chats with The Courier's George E. Pitts in Pittsburgh, where Belafonte met the press, promoting his independent production, 'Odds Against Tomorrow.' If this looks like an interview, it isn't.  The pair is chatting about baseball. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Harry Belafonte talking to George E. Pitts of the Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, in interior
